entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet test -r does not fallback on --results-directory anymore #28986
  • `dotnet test` cannot handle MSBuild command line arguments #28983
  • .NET 7 - Segmentation Fault on BeagleBone Black (arm32) #28982
  • Ability to update sdk (ie version 6.0.306 -> 6.0.403) and install new versions (7) from cli #28977
  • .NET 7.0.100 `dotnet test` cannot parse .rsp file if .NET CLI language is not EN #28975
  • Central event fired when a debugging breakpoint is hit and process pauses #28974
  • VS 17.4.0 Error "pack Microsoft.Android is not installed" #28972
  • Workload installation failed: No space left on device #28962
    Discussion

Closed

  • BuildX for arm64 on .Net 7.0 is broken #28971
  • The --launch-profile option of `dotnet run` and `dotnet watch run` should fallback to a case-insensitive match if a case-sensitive match isn't found #25868
    7.0.2xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Retarget Microsoft.Extensions.DotNetDeltaApplier to netstandard2.1 #28984
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #28979
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #28978
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce Roslyn-based GenAPI #28967
    Area-GenAPI
  • Deps.json should include project references that aren't present in project.assets.json #28963
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #28950
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #28944
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #28945
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #28961
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2041551 #28957
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Backport Add Blazor SWA Baseline Mismatched Assets Logging #28894
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Make all public API in dotnet-watch.dll internal and sealed. #28260
    feature-dotnetwatch, Area-Watch
  • Use architecture specific DOTNET_ROOT variable name #27566
    Area-Infrastructure, feature-dotnetwatch, Area-CLI, Area-Watch
  • Update to the RTM version of 7.0 #28949
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Handle test parser forwarded args #27961
    Area-DotNet Test, Area-CLI, cli-ux, 7.0.1xx
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Backport Add Blazor SWA Baseline Mismatched Assets Logging #28893
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/6.0.1xx] ResolveReadyToRunCompilers: map non-portable rids when targetOS is determined (backport #28380) #28782
    Servicing-consider, Area-ReadyToRun
  • Template verifier adoption in CommonTemplateTests #28707
    Area-dotnet new, Area-Common templates
  • Add PackageDependenciesDesignTime to cache assets file #28405
  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28930
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28948
    Area-Infrastructure
